subject: Re: Fwd: Missing Stores on Website
preview: Hi Chris, I'm working on the task for GMB links.

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris, 

I'm working on the task for GMB links.

‌

Hi Rika,

Sensational, thanks!

Tell me, did you receive a task for Big Barber that involved updating the address URL using GMB link + Google Map embed?

Here is the Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Pg5CE37y8wOIVbBAMxgrGBu0cFdWAcR5f5oBs4F9YKk/edit?usp=sharing

Regards,



Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager
Mobile: 0421 859 547
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au







ID0EC

‌

Hi Rika,

Great question and the answer is no. Sorry, I didn't realise "Woden" x2 were already there.

We just need to remove the Werribee as it a double up of Hoppers Crossing (screenshot).

Also, I have asked the client to go through ALL the information and update it for consistency. Things like naming conventions, address, phone number etc. I will share this with you once complete.

Regards,



Chris Paradowkski
Partnerships Manager
Mobile: 0421 859 547
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au







ID0EC

Hi Chris, 

Just to clarify, is this in addition to https://bigbarberdelux.com/locations/woden-valley/? I've checked they have the same details.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
‌
Hi Rika,

Please see below request from Big Barber.

1. As it turns out, the Werribee location is a double and needs to be removed.

2. In its place, can we create location "Woden"

Please let me know if you need any further details.

Regards,
Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager
Mobile: 0421 859 547
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au

2606

Thanks & Regards

Pankaj
